title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 70 - Public Accountancy
content:

State Regulations
§ 70.1 - Definition of practice of public accountancy
§ 70.2 - Professional study of public accountancy
§ 70.3 - Experience requirements
§ 70.4 - Licensing examinations
§ 70.5 - Licensure by endorsement
§ 70.6 - Limited permits
§ 70.7 - Practice by certain out-of-state individuals and firms
§ 70.8 - Registration of a firm

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 70

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 210, 212, 6501, 6502, 6504, 6506, 6507, 6508, 7401, 7401-a, 7402, 7403, 7404, 7406, 7406-a, 7407, 7408, 7409, 7410; L. 1988, ch. 544; L. 2008, ch. 651

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
